ygData.subject: RE: days played
ygData.msgSnippet: Karlan, the first player to reach 50 was able to get another character to 50 in 17 days played.  I m pretty sure the first 20  levels took him no time at all.
ygData.messageBody:
Karlan, the first player to reach 50 was able to get another character to 50
in 17 days played. I'm pretty sure the first 20 levels took him no time at
all.

Fidan

-----Original Message-----
From: rpeiper@... [mailto:rpeiper@...]
Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 8:54 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] days played


From: rpeiper@...


My top character is level 16 (well 15 now, but that is a long
story..
he WAS 16) and made that in under 6 game days. A good deal of that was spent
dying and wandering. If I concentrate on him he should hit 20 in 10 game
days
easily and I would hardly consider myself experienced. I would bet a
twinked,
power leveled character can hit 20 in 5 days or less. I have a friend who
hit
20 in 6 days with his Barbarian Warrior.
